    • BoardController

      public BoardController​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] board)
      Not default constructor for the BoardController class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell​(CellMessage cellMessage)
      This method updates cells when a CellMessage arrives.
      Parameters:
      cellMessage - containing coordinates, high and occupied states of the cell to be updated

    • checkWorkerChosen

      public Coord checkWorkerChosen​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> map, javafx.scene.image.ImageView source)
      This method checks that you select one of your workers for the action.
      Parameters:
      map - containing your worker's coordinates like keys and their possible future positions like values
      source - is the source of the cell clicked for the move/build
      Returns:
      coordinates of the selected cell for the move/build if it is possible null otherwise

    • checkAvailability

      public ActionResponse checkAvailability​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> map, javafx.scene.image.ImageView source)
      This method checks the availability of a cell chosen for place a worker at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      map - contains available positions
      source - clicked to place there the worker
      Returns:
      an ActionResponse if the selected cell is ok, null otherwise

    • checkAction

      public Coord checkAction​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> cellsAvailable, javafx.scene.image.ImageView source, Coord starterPosition)
      This method checks the clicked cell for the move/build.
      Parameters:
      cellsAvailable - contains available cells
      source - is the clicked cell
      starterPosition - is the cell where your selected worker is before moving/building
      Returns:
      coordinates of the selected cell for the move/build if it is possible null otherwise

    • underlineWorkers

      public void underlineWorkers​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> cells)
      This method set a DropShadow effect in the cell where you have your workers.
      Parameters:
      cells - is the HashMap content in the ActionRequest message

    • removeUnderlineWorkers

      public void removeUnderlineWorkers​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> cells)
      This method removes the DropShadow effect from your workers' cells.
      Parameters:
      cells - is the HashMap content in the ActionRequest message

    • underlineMoves

      public void underlineMoves​(java.util.Map<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> cells, Coord startPosition)
      This method set a DropShadow effect in the cells where you can move/build with your workers.
      Parameters:
      cells - is the HashMap content in the ActionRequest message
      startPosition - is the cell where your selected worker is before moving/building

    • removeUnderlineMoves

      This method removes the DropShadow effect from your available cells for the move/build after the choice.
